meanings.definition: The act or process of developing.
meanings.sent1: The developments in technology have made our lives easier.
meanings.sent2: The city is experiencing rapid developments in infrastructure.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected developments in the plot of the movie kept us on the edge of our seats.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic talent showed promising developments like a blooming flower.
meanings.sent5: The developments in science opened up new possibilities for exploration.

meanings.definition: A new event or situation that is a result of recent changes.
meanings.sent1: The sudden developments in the weather caught us by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The political developments have caused a stir in the community.
meanings.sent3: The developments in the storyline of the TV show took an unexpected turn.
meanings.sent4: The developments in the case shed light on the truth like a spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The developments in the market led to increased competition among businesses.

meanings.definition: A new building or group of buildings.
meanings.sent1: The real estate company announced new developments in the downtown area.
meanings.sent2: The luxury developments along the coast attract many tourists.
meanings.sent3: The developments in the neighborhood brought a sense of community.
meanings.sent4: The modern developments in architecture redefine the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The residential developments offer a variety of housing options for families.
